# 4.6 Operation on Strings

## Subset

Q Use > ?str_sub() to get the function help. And run examples in a code chunk.
```{r}
library(stringr)
?str_sub()
hw <- "Hadley Wickham"

str_sub(hw, 1, 6)
str_sub(hw, end = 6)
str_sub(hw, 8, 14)
str_sub(hw, 8)
str_sub(hw, c(1, 8), c(6, 14))

```
